name: memento
description: self-compacting, reverse-order log of key-value deltas
author: Kyle E. Mitchell <kyle@kemitchell.com> (https://kemitchell.com/)

scripts.lint: npm run lint:readme && npm run lint:source
scripts.lint:readme: ! defence --info javascript README.md | standard --stdin --verbose 2>/dev/null | grep -F -v 'no-multiple-empty-lines' | grep -F -v 'standardjs.com'
